sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels Borcas is also mentioned, however the book makes no description whatsoever about his nose.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
When the newly graduated recruits are assigned to their orders [[Dareon]] is told by [[Maester Aemon]] to report to Borcas at [[Eastwatch-by-the-Sea]], and warned not to comment on his nose.<ref>"[[You Win or You Die]]"</ref>
